title: Get Certified in Platform Engineering, Starting Aug. 6
author: Todd R Weiss
description: The new certification coursework from PlatformEngineering.org is one of the first of its kind to deliver a full training regimen in this growing IT admin role.
cntitle: 8 月 6 日起，开始平台工程认证
cndescription: PlatformEngineering.org 的新认证课程是首批针对这一不断发展的 IT 管理员角色提供完整培训方案的课程之一。
